title: Hair in food
text: Our first experience here was unfortunately horrible. We sat at the bar. Bartender was nice. We had 70 minutes to dine before needing to leave. We ordered drinks and got them then ordered food. Then about 5 minutes later same bartender comes back and asks if we are ready to order food...we say we already did..he is like of right..clearly the order had not been put in. ok so no big deal we keep enjoying our drink. Food takes a long time to arrive.. finally comes! I have about 2 fries and one bite of my burger and discover a dark long wavy hair in my burger (I have short straight blonde hair so I know it’s not mine) I show the bartender and he asks if I want another burger...well yes of course I’m not eating this! My husband has time to finish his whole meal before my new one arrives..and it’s an impossible burger so no fear of it being raw it literally takes 2 minutes to grill. By this time we are about to be late to our plans so I tell him just to box it up because I won’t have tome to eat. It finally arrives. My husband has left to get car and I still have to get bartenders attention to get check. Then to my surprise I’m charged for the burger! I’m sorry but I feel that should of been comped or you should of brought a quick app out for me to eat as I’m starving or even a free drink but nothing!!! For a hair in my food!! I almost said something but I was in a rush and didn’t feel like being rude. Will I give them another chance...not sure....bartender was very nice but that was the only positive.

title: Best place ever!!
text:
Review

Wow where do I begin! First off ...stay here!!! And I’ll tell you why,

Nothing is more fun than staying in an airstream where you have the luxury of a hotel room but the rustic outdoors at your doorstep! I fell in love with waking up and sitting outside by the lake with my coffee in hand getting breakfast ready over our outdoor fire pit! Then we would go hiking for the day and come back to sip wine and cook dinner again over the fire! Loved it!! The airstreams are very clean and had all the amenities that you might need, anything else can easily be purchased from the clubhouse!

The staff is the next reason. They are easily available by text and are so nice!! I re-injured a college knee injury and was hobbling around and the staff did all they could to help and make sure we had everything we needed.

Lastly is the location, only about an hour from Yosemite valley and wawona trails! It is also only about 10 minutes from Mariposa which had lots of cute stores and places to eat (if you’re not feeling like cooking!)

Thank you so much to everyone there who made our stay the best it could be considering the Covid shutdowns. I definitely want to return post shut down and maybe in the summer to enjoy that beautiful pool!!

title: Ok
text: There was no real amenities offered due to covid but I still had to pay an amenities fee. I feel it should have been optional, I wanted the amenities listed on website not a bath bomb for $29. Otherwise cool hotel

title: Worth the hype
text: These are amazing!! Talk about some amazing fried dough and powdered sugar!! Everyone needs to try at least one of these!!

title: Wow just wow!! Must go!!
text: What an amazing dining experience we just had!! From the attention to detail to the perfectly balanced flavor combinations everything was amazing! The staff makes you feel like you are dining at a friends house! Their presentation of the food and their passion is what really stands out! They are just as excited for you to try the dish as you are!! All I can say is wow!! Well done guys!! I’d give you 10 stars if I could!

title: A must see while in Philadelphia!!
text: Great audio tour!! We loved going here and doing the free self guided audio tour. They have done an excellent job with providing information and history and making you think about things today!

title: Overall we had a fantastic
text:
Overall we had a fantastic dinner here! We arrived about 5 minutes before our reservation and were promptly seated at a table literally on the sidewalk with one of us facing a plain wall. There was another area on sidewalk/street that was at least cute and had nice view of the square gardens and then of course all the cute pictures you see on here of Talula’s Garden area. Now I’m not one to complain but on the reservation special details part I put it was our 2 year anniversary dinner. So it was disappointing to literally be sat at the worse table in the place and see others arrive to garden tables.

Ok food. Food was on point! We ordered the brussel sprouts and cornbread sides as appetizers and both were delicious!!! For dinner my husband ordered the fried chicken dinner and loved it. I got the vegetable and grain bowl and it was perfect! Both good sized too!

So again I probably would of stayed as long as reservation allowed and continued to drink but there was no ambience so we got check. Check done and we are literally about to get up when waitress brings us 2 tiny pieces of mocha cake and says oh happy anniversary. Again if this had happened in good timing I would of probably ordered a glass of champagne to go with it but instead I enjoyed the fabulous bite with nothing to wash it down.

So overall I can’t give it a bad review because of all the good food but was not what I would expect from my high bill price. They need to step up their customer service game.

title: Must try the PB&J wings!!
text: Amazing!! Great food great atmosphere! You have to try the PB&J wings!! They are phenomenal!!! They have great main dishes as well. The veggies tacos hit the spot!

title: Elevated bar food like no other!
text:
From the minute you walk in you can tell this place is different from all the rest! From the artwork to the decor everything is well thought out and makes an impression!

Next comes the cocktails! These are not just your typical, weak bar cocktails, these are hand crafted, strong but perfectly balanced, delicious cocktails! Their beer menu is also quite extensive and has great variety! We tried several both on tap and cans throughout the night!

Now let’s talk food! This is elevated bar food at its best! We started with the Duckfat Fried Brussels, Cheese Curds, Elote, and Fried Deviled Eggs! Can I just say I did not know a deviled egg could get any better but then I tried this! It was amazing! As were the other apps! Loved the use of duck fat in the Brussels! I could of just had those as my dinner!

Next up were the mains! My husband got the Drunkin Spinalis and I got the Veggie Plate! Chef had me at goat cheese grits and it did not disappoint! I tried my husbands spinalis and it was perfected cooked medium rare and was melt in your mouth delicious!

I’d come nightly if I didn’t live in Chattanooga! If you live anywhere close to this place go there now!

title: MUST GO!!!!!
text: This brewery is awesome!! It’s a new establishment but the beer is phenomenal!!! The owner himself gave us a tour and told us how it all got started while having a beer with us! He is so cool! Can’t wait to return and see how this brewery grows!

title: Must see!!
text: When in Athens this is definitely worth a visit! Get there early or late to avoid the cruise tour crowds!

title: Amazing Mexican and Greek food in one place
text: We had a great lunch here! My husband got a burrito and it was a good size and very good! I got the falafel and it was delicious! Very impressed for the price of our meal!

title: Great night out!!
text: Lips is a must go! We had so much fun!!! The girls are fantastic and put on a great show! Everyone was so nice and just made the night fun! I’d definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for something to do. The food was very good and the drinks were not weak!! Overall 10/10 experience!!

title: Great way to spend the afternoon
text: We had a great trip with Volcano yachting. We got to go to Red and white beaches which can only be reached by boat. The crew was very nice. We got to see a stunning sunset over the water. The food was very good and the crew was very nice Since we don't eat seafood they even made a separate pasta without shrimp just for us.

title: GREAT BBQ!!!!
text: Went here after a long day of travel because it was just down from our hotel and boy did we luck out! Great food and great craft beer selection! Wanted to go back another night while we were there but we already had our meals planned out! Go here!

title: Best service for ATV rental!
text: Rented an ATV for the day and they were so nice! Our hotel was very close by so we just walked there to pick up our ATV. The guy was very nice with the whole rental process and even gave us a couple extra hours in the 1 day rental. The next day when we dropped the ATV off they took us back by our hotel to pick up our luggage and then on to the port. Very nice people and very high quality ATV! We had so much fun!

title: Must visit while in Mykonos!
text: Very nice place for an affordable meal in Mykonos! The food was very good and the staff was very nice! We sat outside in their little alleyway and when it started to sprinkle the staff quickly ushered us all inside to a nice back seating area. Would definitely go here again!

title: Good cocktails, a little pricey
text: Went here for a pre-dinner cocktail. Staff was nice. Cocktail was good but nothing amazing for the price. Very nice presentation of the drinks. Nice view of the sea even though it was cloudy and there was no sunset the night we were there. I would give it a 4.5 if i could.

title: Must visit!
text: We love going to breweries when we travel and this was one of my favorite and most informative tours i have been on! The guy was nice and really knowledgeable! He is from Athens and we were headed there next and he gave us great advice of were to go while we were there! We got to sample beer right out of the tanks! Really cool tour for 15 euro pp. Go here for the tour or at least a beer. Great craft beer!
place: Cellar Tour & Beer Tasting at Mykonos Brewing Company

title: SO GOOD!!!!
text:
We rented ATV so wanted to explore the island so decided to come here for lunch! So glad we did. The staff is very friendly. The food is SOOOO GOOD and very reasonable
priced. Go here!

title: AMAZING!!
text: This place was the best place we ate in Mykonos! The food was amazing! the service was amazing! The wine was amazing! The view of the sunset was AMAZING! The only thing I would say that took away from the experience is that when you sit outside in the alley tourists are constantly walking but to take pictures and go down below of the rocks and take more pictures and black your view that you are paying A LOT for. I wish the restaurant could block off their alley for customers only. The balconies require a full meal (2 apps, 2 entrees, drinks) hind site I wish I had asked if we could do one app and one dessert and that count but I said that the alley was fine but the balcony would have been worth it to keep the people walking by you out of the picture. But overall we had a great dinner!

title: Very nice stay
text: Had a great stay here. Very nice accommodations. Staff was very friendly. Welcome drink and souvenir shot glasses. Room was nice with a cute front and back balcony. Room service breakfast was very good. Would stay again.

title: You will be STUFFED after this tour!!!
text: Great street food tour where you will get more like 4-5 meals not 4-5 street samples!! It was just my husband and I on the tour so we ended up having a private tour! Our guide was very nice and told us a lot about Naples and its history not just about food! All the food stops were delicious! Only negative I would say is the day before the tour you get your location confirmation and it says do you want to add the drink package. I was confused because in the description it says food and drinks but only 1 drink is included. If you purchase the drink package for 16 euro pp extra you get an additional 2 drinks. We purchased the extra thinking it would be fun cocktails or wine pairings but basically you just get a house beer or wine at 2 of the stops, which probably cost about 4euro each so you kind of feel ripped off. But otherwise it was great so I still have it 5 stars.
place: Naples Street Food Tour - Do Eat Better Experience

title: I know it's not Italian food but you must go HERE!!
text: Great Mexican food in Italy!! After 3 days in Naples we were up for a change in cuisine and this hit the spot! Great burritos and Mexican beers! Staff was friendly. They do not have a menu in English but the staff will help interpret if you have questions. Delicious! Would go back again for sure!

title: Great beers!
text: As a craft beer lover it is sometimes hard to find in new locations. This is the place to go! Huge selection of bottles/cans and about 4 drafts. Really friendly staff who can help you with selections as well. Go here if you like craft beer!
place: OAK Wine and Craft Beer Bar

title: Tucked away from the main road little gem!
text: This place was delicious! It's off the main road so it is nice and charming. The food was very good and the prices were reasonable. We each did a pasta and a main with wine. They gave us complementary bruschetta too! Friendly staff!

title: Best Pizza in Naples!
text: 1st day in Naples and we headed here for lunch! The pizza was amazing and HUGE! Neither of us could finish ours because we each ordered one not knowing Naple's pizza are huge! But it was delicious! I got the double tomatoes one with yellow and red tomatoes and it was phenomenal! Go here you will not regret it!

title: Incredible experience!
text: Where to begin! This place is awesome. From the moment we arrived we were welcomed in with a glass a Cava and a friendly staff. The evening only got better from there! The staff was AMAZING! They are so nice and really make the class fun! They teach you step by step to make the paella with plenty of Cava as you go! The paella that you make is amazing! So flavorful and several varieties are made and you get to try them all. Highly recommend booking with them you will not regret it!
place: Paella Cooking Experience with Professional Chef and Bottomless Wine

title: Great craft beer selection and food!
text: If you are looking for some good variety in craft beer this is the place to go! Great selection and friendly helpful staff. The food was also very good! My husband did the chicken wings, Roasted peppers, and bravos, I did the Tofu burger. All were very flavorful and good quality/quantity for the price.

title: Just beautiful!
text: It is hands down worth a visit no matter how many Basilicas you have been in this one is just amazing. Audio tour is very informative. Do not skip this when in Barcelona!

title: Great spot of Tapas
text: Wonderful place for delicious tapas. Wide variety of tapas. We each tried about 3 and each one was amazing. Great price for quality that you get. Big bar full of tapas and you just choose the ones you want to try and keep the toothpicks to pay at the end. Very friendly staff who can explain to you what the tapas are if you are unsure!

title: Amazing food, cozy environment, wonderful staff!
text: Very small intimate restaurant. Definitely recommend reservations. We did the 3 course with wine pairing. Everything was AMAZING. Wine pairing was excellent. It was basically the chef and one waiter and they did a phenomenal job! I would definitely return next time I am in Barcelona!

title: Excellent service!
text: Went for our anniversary weekend. Upon finding out it was our anniversary they sent up a bottle of wine and cake pops with a hand signed card! It’s personal touches like that that make you remember a place and choose to return! Thank you Hyatt!!

title: Amazing food! Amazing experience!
text: Had an amazing dining experience here at Restaurant L. Food was amazing. Every dish was perfectly paired with a delightful wine! The dishes were unique and the flavor combinations took you on a culinary journey! Highly recommend!
